eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maui, HI; AT 05:25 PM ON SEP 23, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:25 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: MEMA Alert: A fast-moving brush fire is burning in the near Holomua RD and Baldwin AVE in Paia area on Maui. Repeat, A fast-moving brush fire is burning in the Holomua RD and Baldwin AVE in Paia area on Maui. Evacuation order is in place for Holomua RD and Baldwin AVE in Paia. Follow direction from public safety personnel. Avoid the area. Sent by the Maui Emergency Management Agency (MEMA).
